entry.title: Tama Superstar Classic 14x6.5” Snare Drum Jet Blue Burst
entry.summary:

Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 150.00

Tama Superstar Classic 14x6.5” Snare Drum Jet Blue Burst.

Used excellent condition. Fantastic snare, all maple 7ply, 45 edges and that classic Tama T badge!  Great addition to any Kit.

entry.title: Tama Superstar Classic Red Sparkle 3pc Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tama
Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 450.00

Tama Superstar Classic 3pc Red Sparkle drum set. 
22x18,16x14,12x9

Used some minor wear mainly on the bass drum.  Some tape residue and some blemishes on bass drum hoops.  Minor blemishes in the wrap and some age on the chrome. 


For nearly forty years the Superstar name has stood for groundbreaking design, ­superior build quality, sterling tone, and clear projection. Now Tama introduces this ­legendary kit in its most sonically aggressive persona yet¦featuring 100% maple ­shells. Thinner and livelier than ever, the Tama designers have dialed in the perfect ­combination of sensitivity and high-end "cut."

Drawing on Superstar of the past, its classic Tama T-shape badge and streamlined ­low-mass single lugs point to the simpler state of art of the 70's, while the ingenious ­Star-Mount system maximizes resonance and eclipses everything in its class-all at a surprisingly affordable price.

entry.title: Tama Superstar Classic Indigo Sparkle 5pc Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tama
Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 799.99

$799.99 Tama Superstar Classic 5pc drum set in Indigo sparkle wrap. Brand new. Snare stand not included.
Overview
Offering the full, professional-grade sound of a 100% maple drum set at a price lower than you’ll find from any of their competitors, Tama’s Superstar Classic kits represent a groundbreaking new step in the union of affordability and high-end design. Introducing a new generation of drummers to the benefits of all-maple construction, Tama is breaking down industry barriers with the release of these remarkably well-crafted sets.

All-maple shells, TT/FT/SD: 6-ply, 5 mm / BD: 8-ply, 7 mm
Star-Mount system
Triple flanged hoop
Low-mass single lugs
Claw hooks w/rubber spacers
Power Craft II drum heads
Classic Tama T-badge
Specifications
Configuration
Bass drum(s): 20 x 16 in.
Tom(s): 10 x 7, 12 x 8 in.
Floor tom(s): 14 x 14 in.
Snare: 14 x 5 in.

entry.title: Tama Metalworks 10x3” Effects Snare Drum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tama
Type: Snare Drum
Price: 149.99

$149.99 New Tama Metalworks "Effects" 10" Mini-Tymp snare drum.  Includes tom clamp. 

Steel shell 10x3”.

Snares can be fine-tuned and then easily turned on or off w/ Tama's unique Mod-Tone snare adjustment system.

A Tama MC69 tom arm and clamp is included so you can mount this drum just about anywhere you'd like.

This snare has plenty of attack and can be used as an auxiliary effects snare or as your main snare when you need a smaller rig. With the snares turned off it adds some nice timbale flavor to your sound.

entry.title: Tama SLP New-Vintage Hickory Snare Drum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tama
Type: Snare Drum
Price: 399.99

$399.99 Brand New Tama SLP 14x5” New-Vintage Hickory Snare Drum🔥🔥 Hickory Snare with Mini Brass Tube Lugs

The TAMA S.L.P. New-Vintage Hickory is built from six plies of select American hickory — a relative newcomer to the snare market . Paired with its 8-hole, 2.3mm triple-flanged Steel Mighty Hoops, the New-Vintage Hickory delivers a warm, articulate response and breathy top end that works especially well for jazz, blues, and funk-based styles of music. Offset mini brass tube legs deliver heaping handfuls of those mid-century visuals. All the while, top-shelf TAMA hardware and appointments — a Linear-Drive throw off and butt plate, 20-strand Super Sensitive Hi-Carbon snare wires, and premium Evans G1/Snare Side heads — supply the New-Vintage Hickory snare with great tone and performance.

entry.title: Tama Soundworks 13x7” Kapur Snare
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tama
Type: Snare Drum
Price: 299.99

$299.99 Tama Soundworks Kapur 13x7” Snare Brand New. At just 6mm thick, the TAMA Soundworks Kapur snare drum is full of life and possibility. Its shell is expertly formed from seven carefully selected plies of dense kapur wood. TAMA's proprietary bearing edges feature 45° inners and rounded outers for solid head contact with a good balance of openness and attack.

Sound Arc steel hoops

TAMA's Sound Arc flanged hoops are responsible for the classic open tone of the Soundworks Kapur. The edges of these 2.3mm hoops are bent inward to allow the natural tone of the kapur shell to shine.

entry.title: Tama Soundworks 14x6.5” Vintage Maple Snare
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tama
Type: Snare Drum
Price: 299.99

$299.99 Tama Vintage Maple Soundworks snare drum. Brand new. Awesome snare with 10 lug arc hoops!
Soundworks Maple drums are constructed with six carefully selected plies of 100% Maple, for a 5mm thin shell. Each shell is carefully molded and bearing edges are cut with extreme precision. Soundworks Maple offers a beautifully resonant, warm, and open tone suitable for any style of music.

Specifications:
Model - DMP1465
UPC - 04515276849582
Series - Soundworks
Size - 6.5”x14"
Hardware Color - Chrome
Color - Matte Vintage Maple (MVM)
Lugs - MSL60S
Strainer/Butt - MCS70A/MCS70B
Hoops - Sound Arc Hoop (10 Hole)
Plys - 5mm, 6 Ply Maple
Snare Wire - MS20R14S
